title: Idiomatic Japanese Fill-in-the-Blank Exercises
author: Hilofumi Yamamoto
affiliation: International Student Center, University of Tsukuba
description: Fill in the blanks with appropriate idiomatic expressions.

expression-en: It only rains when you don't have an umbrella with you, so you can never count on the weather forecast.
expression-ja: (傘:かさ)を(持:も)って(来:こ)ない(日:ひ)に(a)(雨:あめ)が(降:ふ)るから、(天気予報:てんきよほう)はまるで(b)。

expression-en: It's cold again today, though not as cold as yesterday.
expression-ja: (今日:きょう)も(寒:さむ)いが、それでもきのうほど(a)。

expression-en: If I said that I'll do it, I'll see it through to the end.
expression-ja: (私:わたし)はやると(言:い)ったからには(最後:さいご)まで(a)。

a: やらなければならない

expression-en: It's locked, so they've probably gone out somewhere.
expression-ja: (鍵:かぎ)が(a)いるから、どこかへ(出:で)かけたのでしょう。

expression-en: The weather is cloudy and grey, threatening to rain at any moment.
expression-ja: どんよりと(曇:くも)った、今にも(a)(天気:てんき)だ。

expression-en: I can't figure it out at all. (I have no idea what's what.)
expression-ja: (何:なに)が(a)(さっぱり)わからない。

expression-en: I looked out of the window for some reason or another and noticed that the leaves have turned red.
expression-ja: (a)(窓:まど)の(外:そと)を(見:み)ると、(木:き)の(葉:は)が(赤:あか)く(染:そ)まっていた。

expression-en: We are into late autumn, and the early mornings and evenings are quite chilly. How are you?
expression-ja: (秋:あき)も(深:ふか)まり(朝晩:あさばん)めっきり(a)が、その(後:ご)いかがお(過:す)ごしでしょうか。

expression-en: I read it after a fashion, but I didn't really understand what it was about.
expression-ja: (読む:よむ)ことは(a)が(内容:ないよう)はよくわかりませんでした。

expression-en: Although he really knew, he pretended not to and told me nothing.
expression-ja: (彼:かれ)は(知:し)っていたくせに(a)をして(私:わたし)に(教:おし)えて(b)。

expression-en: No matter how rapid the current is, the fish swim upstream.
expression-ja: どんなに(流:なが)れが(a)(魚:さかな)は(川:かわ)をのぼって(行:い)く。

expression-en: She worked every day, without missing even a single day.
expression-ja: (彼女:かのじょ)は(毎日:まいにち)(一日:いちにち)も(a)(働:はたら)いた。

expression-en: After you've arrived there safely, please give me a call right away.
expression-ja: (向:む)こうに(無事:ぶじ)に(a)すぐ(電話:でんわ)をください。

expression-en: Even though they say it's already spring, it's as cold as if winter were still here.
expression-ja: もう(春:はる)だというのに、まるで(冬:ふゆ)の(a)(寒:さむ)さです。

expression-en: I have a slight headache, but since I have an exam today I have no choice but to go to school.
expression-ja: (少:すこ)し(頭:あたま)が(痛:いた)いけれど、(今日:きょう)は(試験:しけん)があるから、どうしても(学校:がっこう)へ(行:い)かない(a)。

expression-en: If you see Tanaka-san tomorrow, please tell him/her to give me a call.
expression-ja: あした(田中:たなか)さんに(a)、(私:わたし)に(電話:でんわ)する(a)ください。

expression-en: One more failure and we will probably be compelled to call off the study.
expression-ja: (今度:こんど)(失敗:しっぱい)したら、もう(研究:けんきゅう)を(続:つづ)けることは(a)を(得:え)ないだろう。

expression-en: No matter how much you eat, you don't necessarily gain weight.
expression-ja: いくらたくさん(a)、(b)(太:ふと)るとはかぎりません。

expression-en: The higher you climb on a mountain, the thinner the air becomes.
expression-ja: (高:たか)い(所:ところ)に(登:のぼ)れば(a)ますます(山:やま)の(上:うえ)の(空気:くうき)は(少:すく)なくなります。

expression-en: If I had to make a choice, I'd say that I like fish better than meat.
expression-ja: (私:わたし)は(a)といえば、(肉:にく)より(魚:さかな)のほうが(好:す)きです。

expression-en: I looked over all the grammars I could lay my hands on, but no such thing appears anywhere in them.
expression-ja: (文法書:ぶんぽうしょ)(a)(文法書:ぶんぽうしょ)はすべて(目:め)を(通:とお)しましたが、どこにもそんなことは(書:か)いてありませんよ。

expression-en: After I conducted one study after another, the experiment finally yielded results.
expression-ja: (研究:けんきゅう)に(研究:けんきゅう)を(a)、やっと(実験:じっけん)の(結果:けっか)が(出:で)ました。

expression-en: Sunlight, water, and carbon dioxide are necessary for plants to grow.
expression-ja: (植物:しょくぶつ)にとって(日光:にっこう)と(水分:すいぶん)と(二酸化炭素:にさんかたんそ)は(生育:せいいく)に(a)ないものである。

expression-en: I still can't get out of that childhood habit.
expression-ja: (子:こ)どもの(時:とき)の(癖:くせ)が(a)に(直:なお)らない。

expression-en: If I have to buy [something] regardless, I'd like to buy something that's cheap and good.
expression-ja: (同:おな)じ(買:か)う(a)、(安:やす)くて(良:よ)いものが(買:か)いたい。

expression-en: With this kind of academic record, you couldn't possibly get into a good university.
expression-ja: (こんな)(成績:せいせき)では(a)(いい)(大学:だいがく)には(入:はい)れない。

expression-en: It's only natural for human beings to make mistakes.
expression-ja: (人間:にんげん)の(a)だから、(間違:まちが)うのは(当:あた)り(前:まえ)だ。

expression-en: People say there are too few parks in Japan, but is that really true?
expression-ja: (日本:にほん)は(公園:こうえん)が(少:すく)なすぎると(言:い)われているが、(果:はた)して(a)か。

expression-en: This time very few people came, but we hope to have as many as possible next time.
expression-ja: (今回:こんかい)は(少:すく)なかったが、(次回:じかい)は(a)(多:おお)くの(人:ひと)に(来:き)てもらいたいものだ。

expression-en: Much to our regret, we are obliged to conclude that he is the criminal.
expression-ja: 非常に(残念:ざんねん)なことだが、(彼:かれ)が(犯人:はんにん)と(a)をえない。

expression-en: It is not until we have time to rest that we can lead our lives as human beings.
expression-ja: (休養:きゅうよう)があって(a)、(人間:にんげん)の(生活:せいかつ)は(b)。

answers.expression-en: It's worthless to go all the way to Japan and not study Japanese.
answers.expression-ja: (わざわざ)(日本:にほん)へ(来:き)て、(日本語:にほんご)を(勉強:べんきょう)しないのは(来:き)た(a)。

answers.expression-en: I start to feel like travelling somewhere, though I don't have any particular place in mind.
answers.expression-ja: どこかへ(旅:たび)に(行:い)きたくなるが、(別:べつ)にどこというきまった(a)はない。
(東北線:とうほくせん)の(全列車:ぜんれっしゃ)はスキー(客:きゃく)で(a)づめだ。

answers.expression-en: I don't care who laughs at me.
answers.expression-ja: (誰:だれ)に(a)(笑:わら)われようと。

answers.expression-en: Far from feeling relieved, I'm so worried that I can't sleep a wink at night.
answers.expression-ja: (安心:あんしん)する(a)か(心配:しんぱい)で(夜:よる)も(眠:ねむ)れません。

answers.expression-en: It's been raining continuously since the day before yesterday.
answers.expression-ja: この(雨:あめ)は(一昨日:いっさくじつ)から(a)。

answers.expression-en: On serene autumn nights, thoughts of my late mother come to mind.
answers.expression-ja: (秋:あき)の(静:しず)かな(夜:よる)などには、(亡:な)くなった(母:はは)のことが(a)。

answers.expression-en: The door, which should have been closed, is/was open.
answers.expression-ja: (閉:し)めたはずの(扉:とびら)が(a)。

answers.expression-en: It is rare to see such an interesting film.
answers.expression-ja: こんなおもしろい(映画:えいが)はめったに(a)。

answers.expression-en: Men are expected not just to be strong; men can't be men without gentleness.(=Real men can't just be strong; real men need to be gentle.)
answers.expression-ja: (何:なに)も(強:つよ)い(a)が(男:おとこ)ではない。(優:やさ)しくなければ(男:おとこ)ではない。

answers.expression-en: I am told that that animal's body temperature rises along with an increase in the air temperature.
answers.expression-ja: その(動物:どうぶつ)は(気温:きおん)が(上昇:じょうしょう)するに(a)(体温:たいおん)も(上昇:じょうしょう)するそうです。

answers.expression-en: In the beginning it was easy, but gradually it has gotten more difficult.
answers.expression-ja: (初:はじ)めは(易:やさ)しかったが(a)(難:むずか)しくなってきた。

answers.expression-en: There are just four of us here, so let's play mahjong.(=There are four of us here, which is just right for a game of mahjong.)
answers.expression-ja: (a)４(人:にん)いるから、(マージャン:まーじゃん)をしましょう。

answers.expression-en: When you go to the post office, please stop by the supermarket and do the shopping.
answers.expression-ja: (郵便局:ゆうびんきょく)へ(行:い)く(a)に(スーパー:すーぱー)へ(行:い)って(買物:かいもの)をしてきてください。

answers.expression-en: The more you look at this picture, the more you can relish it(=the more interesting/pleasing it is to look at).
answers.expression-ja: この(絵:え)は(見:み)れば(a)いい(味:あじ)がある。

answers.expression-en: Customers are requested to note that tomorrow is our regular shop-holiday, so we will be closed.
answers.expression-ja: (明日:あす)は(定休日:ていきゅうび)なので(a)いただきます。

answers.expression-en: I want to contact him straightaway, but unfortunately I don't have his phone number.
answers.expression-ja: (今:いま)すぐ(連絡:れんらく)したいのだが、(a)(彼:かれ)の(電話番号:でんわばんごう)がわからない。

answers.expression-en: He always tells funny stories and makes us laugh.
answers.expression-ja: (彼:かれ)はいつもおもしろい(話:はなし)をして(私:わたし)たちを(a)。

answers.expression-en: A lot of trees burned down in the forest fire.
answers.expression-ja: (山火事:やまかじ)でたくさんの(木:き)が(a)しまった。

answers.expression-en: As long as we had water, we could survive for a few days.
answers.expression-ja: (水:みず)(a)あれば、二、三(日:にち)ぐらい(生:い)き(延:の)びることができる。

answers.expression-en: No matter how hard it is, you must keep on trying right to the end.
answers.expression-ja: (どんなに)(つら:つら)くても(最後:さいご)まで(a)なければならない。

answers: Mum, what would you like for a present?
